text: Isolona deightonii is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is found in Ghana and Sierra Leone. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * Hawthorne, W. 1998. Isolona deightonii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Isolona deightonii
